description: Filename of the processed article (derived from PMC ID)
Boolean flag indicating if open data statement was detected

Categories of open data detected (comma-separated). Common values: 're-use', 'upon request', 'field-specific repository', 'supplement', 'unknown/misspecified source', 'general-purpose repository', 'github'. Can contain combinations like 'field-specific repository, re-use'
Boolean flag indicating if data re-use was detected
Boolean flag indicating if open code statement was detected
Boolean flag indicating if code is available as supplementary material
Boolean flag indicating if code re-use was detected
Boolean flag indicating if open data was detected in Data Availability Statement (DAS)
Boolean flag indicating if open code was detected in Code Availability Statement (CAS)
Data Availability Statement score or identifier (currently unused by oddpub v7.2.3)
Extracted sentences or text snippets containing open data statements
